features: 【Patented Auto-Alignment Tech】Perfect installation within 60 seconds! The S23 plus screen protector is embedded in a plastic frame that fits perfectly over your phone. Set the frame on your phone, swipe down the middle, and done! Watch our Installation Video to see how easy it is to use our Innovative OneTouch Auto-Alignment Screen Protector.
【Only Works】 For Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus / S23 + 5G 6.6 inch 2023. Please check your phone model before buying this glass screen protector.
【9H Hardness】Galaxy S23 Plus screen protectors are created from super scratch-resistant 9H hardness glass to protects your screen from scratches, dust, drop, oil and fingerprint smudges.

【2+2 Pack】 2* Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus / S23 + 6.6" Screen Protectors, 2* Camera Lens Protectors, with 2 auto alignment tool kit (screen protectors come pre-installed in the auto alignment tool) and everything you need to install them!

【Anti-Fingerprint】amFilm screen protector for Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus / S23 + is finished with oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints and provide ultra-clear high definition with 99.9% transparency.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Patented Auto-Alignment Tech Perfect installation within 30 seconds! The S23 Plus screen protector is embedded in a plastic frame that fits perfectly over your phone. Set the frame on your phone, swipe down the middle, and done!

How is the touch sensitivity? Perfect. The touch screen responds quickly. How is the quality? The quality is good on amFilm. 9H tempered glass offers full coverage, scratch resistance, and drop protection for your phone. How can I remove bubbles? If you get a bubble during installation this screen protector, just lift the nearest corner to the bubble, then set it back down, and the bubble should go away. What are the features on amfilm screen protector? Super easy installation, 9H hardness, Shatterproof, Shockproof, Anti-scratches, Anti-fingerprints, HD(99.99% transparency), and bubble-free, etc. How do I connect the seller for a replacement or return? For these: product damage du to transportation, defective products received, missing products or accessories, logistics delays, Amazon omission delivery, and any other problems, please connect us on Amazon platform, We will process within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install , works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I just replaced my phone with a Samsung s23 plus and figured rather than using the screen protectors which use UV curing glues like previously, as this phone has a flat screen, I'll try a more economical and simpler tempered glass protector. I rush purchased another brand as it had 4.5 stars but found it would not adhere in spots despite there not being any dreaded lint bubbles. This was a far superior product, both in the simplicity of install and function. You can tell it was designed better from the start as it comes with a screen alignment jig with the protector already it, the microfiber screen cloth to use after using the alcohol wipe was a decent size and sturdiness, and the whole screen dust removal sticker was larger than the screen (not just barely the same size).As I was installing this protector immediately after I removed the prior poor quality one, I just used the full screen sticker and then placed the jig and installed this protector. It laid down flat, no bubbles, no problem. I used the alcohol wipe and microfiber patch to clean the screen protector after installation as there were slightly visible traces of adhesive from the blue sticker which I'm assuming held the screen protector to the jig. The install took less time than it took to insert the phone back into my two piece outer protective case! Now my S23+ screen looks clean and most importantly, the ultrasonic finger print scanner works again(it failed to recognize or add with the prior protector). Very happy with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The easiest thing ever
reviews.reviewText: I hate putting on screen protectors, I hate all the bubbles you have to push out and aligning it nice and straight.This one was the easiest installation ever. I didn't even realize it was on there cause I had no bubbles to push out. Followed the directions which were simple steps and it worked out amazing. Hopefully it will last nicely as well.For the phone camera protector, it was easy to put on since it aligns right up with your cameras. I had no issues with quality of my camera, I would say make sure you clean your camera very well before hand though to ensure that. I have a otterbox case and a wallet case I use for travel and neither have issues with the camera protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best application of a screen saver I have ever accomplished.
reviews.reviewText: Everything is perfect with this product.The application can be done by a child, with it's easy snap on case.Pull your finger through a couple times and Voila...you watch the protector glide down the screen with perfect flatness as it tightly bonds to your screen.Everything is great and so is the little bits of fabric curly Qs that got stuck underneath.I took the upmost precautions, a small clean bathroom with fog from a hot shower weighing down all air borne dust particles, a lint free cushioned cover, a closed bathroom door and a set of surgical gloves.Didn't matter how I kept everything spotless and in perfect proximity for the surgery.I used the full sheet sticky they provided, but my phone was clean.One quick smooth install later and in the light refraction I could see some air borne pollutants.They were way too deep to fix and the protector firmly holds to the phone, so basically in the end, I DESTROYED the first attempt. My luck with these things.As for the 2nd and final attempt, everything was similar and only 3 small items were found sufficiently close to the edge that I could raise the protector and get them out with the sticky tabs they provided.Here's a valuable tip on how to lift the protector once it's on the phone.Use a thin sharp edge knife and press it with measured firm pressure against the middle of the TOP of the protector edge and LIFT up. The knife will not go underneath it and if you lift slowly the protector will unbond and allow you to hold it's edges up so you can fish a sticky tape underneath. Sometimes the offending piece is stuck to the protector underside, so just turn the tape sticky side up.I had to lift the edge about 3 times and each time it lifted flawlessly without taking out a finger. Again, measured deliberate slow pressure...then UP.If you try this at a corner you will be sorry.Anyways, I wrote a book so I'll have to charge you for it.Jokes aside, it's the best protector I've ever used, and my finger and stylus works perfectly.Hope this helps some poor soul.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent screen protector
reviews.reviewText: I got this the same day because I put a chip in my previous screen protector. This is an excellent product. It was very easy to install. I did have a minor problem. When I pulling on the tab to remove the backing of the screen protector, the backing ripped. Luckily I was able to peel it off without smudging the protector itself. I like that is had a holder ao I could align it on my phone without it getting crooked. I told that company that I definitely will purchase these in the future. The camera protector was easy to install as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: First off , the install was simple and straight forward. No air bubbles and looked perfect. I am a Service Technician and constantly have to crawl in small spaces. Noticed a small blemish in the protector. It completely spidered that same day. Protector seems thin and doesnt hold up to others. Good thing is that my phone screen didnt take any damage and that this pack comes with multiple protectors. All in the end cant really complain if it protected my phone screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought for a 2nd time the amFilm OneTouch tempered glass screen protector, and I have to say, it surpassed my expectations. Installing it was a piece of cake, thanks to the included alignment tool. The touch sensitivity is spot-on, and the screen's clarity is as good as ever. It has held up well against scratches and minor impacts, providing solid protection for my device. In conclusion, the amFilm OneTouch is a trustworthy and top-notch option for keeping your screen safe.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect tempered glass for S23. Look no further!
reviews.reviewText: Initially, I was going to buy the EZ Fit glass from Spigen but I heard it is really brittle and not worth its price. So, went with AmFilm's glass. And, it's perfect!The installation process is as foolproof as possible and the glass quality is top notch. Fingerprint scanner also works nigh flawlessly, after re-registering my fingerprints after installation.Edit after fall: My phone fell from about 5 feet and survived. I have a Tough Armour Case from Spigen and AmFilm tempered glass on my S23.
Easy to install, fingerprint works well, perfect finish, screen smoother now

reviews.reviewTitle: Great screen protector, incredibly easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the purchase. The supplied frame makes very easy to install it precisely. Lovin' it!

Nice product value for money, easy to apply , both the screen and lens protector are in quantity of 2 . There is a littel lag while scanning fingerprint but still OK than other screen protector. After all good experience 👌
Very hassle free to fix. No bubbles. Very smooth and sensitive for fingerprint.
